ISSUE.TITLE: typo & obsolete keys in users endpoint API documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi! /silver/docs/billing-entities/customers.md "name": "John Doe", "company": "ACME Inc.", "email": "johndoe@acme.inc", "address_1": "Funny Road no.4", "address_2": null, "country": "US", "city": "Wilmington", Typos: bold html tags in key names Obsolete key: "name" which was divided into "first_name" & "last_name" Thanks for sharing the code of this great app! jérôme
